N, M = map(int, input().split()) 

print(N * M)


def sum_even_values(n, m):
    return n * m

n, m = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
print(sum_even_values(n, m))


def sum_even_ways(n, m):
    return n * m


n, m = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

print(sum_even_ways(n, m))


N, M = map(int, input().split()) # N은 행의 개수, M은 열의 개수

print(N * M)

N, M = map(int, input().split())

print(N * (M + 1))


def sum_even_values(N, M):
    return (N * M)

N, M = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
print(sum_even_values(N, M))


def sum_even_ways(n, m):
    return n * m

n, m = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
print(sum_even_ways(n, m))
